title: Log into External Site
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site
2. Enter Username/Password
3. Click Log In
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded
2. Fields work as expected
3. User is redirected to external user's home page

title: Download a Consent Form
custom_steps:
1. Hover over "Consent Forms"
2. Select a Consent Form
custom_expected:
1. Verify that the correct consent forms are displayed for the users Country. 
2. Verify that the consent form is downloaded

title: Verify User sees error message
custom_steps: 1. Click Next on homepage without filling any required fields
custom_expected: 1. Verify user is displayed with a blocker message asking them to fill in all required fields. All required fields are highlighted in red

title: Create International Player profile
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields on home page 
2. Click Next
custom_expected:
1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible
2. Verify user is redirected to newly created International Amateur Player Profile. All fields that were filled out on homepage should be populated with same information

title: Verify User sees error message
custom_steps: 1. Click Submit without all required fields filled in
custom_expected: 1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible. Fields that are required and not filled out are highlighted in red.

title: Make sure question appears and if answer is yes futher questions appear
custom_steps:
1. Following question appears in Bio Information  "Has the player ever been to Canada or any of the 50 states of the USA, the District of Columbia(Washington,DC), Puerto Rico , or any other Commonwealth Territory or Possession of the United States of America ?"
2. Select Yes
custom_expected:
1. Residency question is visible and answer is defaulted to No 
2. Radio buttons should be selectable. Selecting Yes should provide more questions: 
- How many times has the player been to any of the above locations? (Text Field)
- How long was the player's longest stay in any of the above locations? (Text Field)
- Please provide the date of the last stay and any additional relevant information that the player provided concerning the above questions

title: Verify only Number can be entered for residency review questions
custom_steps:
1. Enter text in residency review questions 
2. Fill out rest of required fields. 
3. Click submit
custom_expected: 3. User should receive error message that only numeric values can be used for residency questions

title: Verify Add button for all sections
custom_preconds: User is creating a player profile
custom_steps:
1. Click Add on National ID section 
2. Click Trash Can next to additional National ID
3. Click Add on Player's Address Section 
4. Click Trash can next to additional address
5. Click add on Player's Phone Section 
6. Click Trash can on additional phone 
7. Click Add on Player's Email section 
8. Click Trash Can next to additional email
custom_expected:
1. Additional fields present 
2. Additional fields deleted 
3. Additional fields present 
4. Additional fields deleted 
5. Additional fields present 
6. Additional fields deleted 
7. Additional fields present 
8. Additional fields deleted

title: Fill out all Fields on profile page
custom_steps: 1. Fill out all fields on the profile page
custom_expected: 1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible

title: Upload and delete files
custom_steps:
1. Click Add file on Attached Files section 
2. Upload a file 
3. Click Trash Can to remove file 
4. Repeat step 1 and add another file 
5. Add required labels to file
custom_expected:
1. User window opens with computer files 
2. File upload is successful
3. File is removed 
4. File upload is successful 
5. User is able to select more than one label per file.

title: Submit Profile to BOC
custom_preconds:
User is creating a profile 
All required fields have been filled out
custom_steps:
1. Click submit 
2. Log in to the ebis environment that you are testing on with club-boc-intl/club-boc-intl
3. Quicksearch for player that you submitted 
4. Open profile
custom_expected:
1. User receives message that player has been submitted to BOC for review and profile loads in view mode 
2. User's dashboard loads 
3. Player is visible in quicksearch. 
4. Profile loads in view mode. Registration Status is Pending BOC Review

title: Verify a match is found and displayed
custom_preconds: User has already submitted a player to BOC for review
custom_steps:
1. Enter in the details of a player that already exists on the system
2. Click Next
custom_expected:
1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible
2. A duplicate player check should be performed and a message displayed to the Org, that a player profile already exists.

title: Verify the profile
custom_steps: 1. Click player profile link in match message
custom_expected: 1. Verify the player profile is displayed and cannot be edited.

title: Go back and edit the player
custom_steps: 1. Click Cancel on Match message
custom_expected: 1. Verify the Org is returned to previous screen so they can make changes and try to submit again.

title: Verify user does not see match player of different Org
custom_preconds:
Register a player with fed-mex-intl/fed-mex-intl
Login as a different club
custom_steps:
1. Enter in the details of a player that was registered by fed-mex-intl/fed-mex-intl
2. Click Next
custom_expected:
1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible
2. User does not see a match message. When registering a player, the Org should only sees matches to players that they have previously submitted. Any matches to BOC submitted players or Club submitted players should not be displayed.

title: Set first review to Corrections needed
custom_preconds: Player has been submitted to BOC for review by External Org
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Registration Admin widget
3. Find Player submitted by Org
4. Open Player profile
5. Click Edit
6. Locate Registration Reviews section
7. Select any Correction-Needed options for the first review
8. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. The Self Reg player should be visible in the list
4. Player profile should be opened in read only mode. Data from Org form should have been populated in to the profile.
5. Profile should go into edit mode
6. Registration Reviews section should be visible now in edit mode.
7. There should be a list of options to choose from, user should be able to select one of the correction needed statements.
8. Profile status should be updated to "Correction-Needed" and an Email should be generated and sent to the Org

title: Check the contents of the email is correct (English)
custom_steps:
1. Log in to Email, find and open email
2. Verify contents of email
custom_expected:
1. Email should have been sent to the Org
2. Email should have the following contents and populated in the relevant places with the Player Data:

Subject: Correction Needed- Major League Baseball (MLB) International Prospect Registration

Dear (First Name, Last Name)

Your registration with Major League Baseball has been reviewed but cannot be verified by MLB due to the following reason: %CorrectionNeededComments.

Your registration will not be complete until the necessary corrections are made and the profile is verified by an MLB employee. If your registration is verified, a confirmation email will be sent to the provided email address. If your registration still cannot be verified then an email will be sent to the provided email address with instructions on how to correct your registration profile. 

If you do not receive a confirmation email for your re-submitted registration, or if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at registration@mlb.com or (809) 518-2233.

title: Verify player submission form updates to Correction Needed- Spanish Country Player
custom_preconds:
Player submitted must be from one of the following countries: 
Dominican Republic
Venezuela
Panama
Colombia
Mexico
Nicaragua
Argentina
Spain
Costa Rica
Ecuador
El Salvador
Guatemala
Honduras
Peru
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Registration Admin widget
3. Find Player submitted by Org
4. Open Player profile
5. Click Edit
6. Locate Registration Reviews section
7. Select any Correction-Needed options for the first review
8. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. The player should be visible in the list
4. Player profile should be opened in read only mode. Data from Org form should have been populated in to the profile.
5. Profile should go into edit mode
6. Registration Reviews section should be visible now in edit mode.
7. There should be a list of options to choose from, user should be able to select one of the correction needed statements.
8. Profile status should be updated to "Correction-Needed" and an Email should be generated and sent to the Org

title: Check the contents of the email is correct (Spanish)
custom_steps:
1. Log in to Email, find and open email
2. Verify contents of email
custom_expected:
1. Email should have been sent to the Org
2. Email should have the following contents and populated in the relevant places with the Player Data:

Subject: Corrección requerida - Major League Baseball (MLB) Registro internacional del prospecto.

Estimado %firstName %lastName, 

Su registro con la MLB ha sido revisado, pero no puede ser verificado por las MLB debido a la siguiente razón: %CorrectionNeededComments.

Su inscripción no está completa hasta que las correcciones necesarias se realicen y el perfil sea verificado por un empleado de MLB. Si se verifica su inscripción, un correo elctrónico de confirmación será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada. Si el registro aún no se puede verificar, un correo electrónico será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada con instrucciones sobre cómo corregir su perfil de registro. 

Si usted no recibe un correo electrónico de confirmación de su registro, o si tiene alguna pregunta, por favor no dude en poners en contacto con nosotros en registration@mlb.com o (809) 518-2233.

title: Resubmit to BOC for verification
custom_preconds: BOC has marked a player Corrections needed
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Search for the Player that the BOC has marked Correcton Needed
3. Open Player Profile
4. Click Edit
5. Update information
6. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. Player should appear after typing first three letters of name
3. Player profile should be opened in read only mode
4. ONLY Contact Information and Attached files should be editable. Everything else should be locked.
5. Fields and files work appropriately
6. Form should be resubmitted to BOC. BOC Registration Status should now be set to "Resubmitted to BOC"

title: Check they have been saved
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Quicksearch for player that External Org Resubmitted  
3. Open Player profile
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. The Self Reg player should be visible in the list
3. Player profile should be opened in view mode. Verify the changes have been updated in profile

title: Check players submitted by Org are displayed
custom_steps:
1. Enter the first three characters of a Player's name into search that the user submitted to BOC 
2. Click one of the results
custom_expected:
1. Verify search results are displayed for entering 3 or more characters of a players name that has been submitted by the Org
2. Verify that player profile is opened

title: Check players that have NOT been submitted by Org are NOT displayed
custom_steps: 1. Enter the first three characters of a Player's name that you submitted with a different Org
custom_expected: 1. Verify NO search results are found. Org should only see players that they have submitted.

title: Verify email is sent successfully
custom_steps:
1. Click Help
2. Fill out "Email Us" form
3. Click Send
custom_expected:
1. Verify Help page is loaded. 
2. All fields work appropriately
3. A message should be displayed to indicate that the email was sucessfully sent.

title: Verify that all elements are translated correctly
custom_steps:
1. Hover Language and select Espanol
2. Hover Idioma and select English
custom_expected:
1. The site should be reloaded in Spanish
2. The site should be reloaded in English

title: Check that only numerical characters are accepted
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate External Reg Admin widget
3. Click Edit
4. Click Pencil icon for one the External Orgs
5. Enter a Alphabetic Character
6. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. External Reg Admin widget should be visible
3. Verify widget goes into edit mode
4. Verify editable field is displayed
5. User should be able to enter Alphabetic Character
6. Blocker message should be displayed to user "Please correct the following errors - An invalid value has been entered for Registration Limit. Please enter numbers only."

title: Check that you cannot enter a LOWER number than is already registered
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate External Reg Admin widget
3. Click Edit
4. Click Pencil icon for one the External Orgs
5. Enter a Number that is LOWER than Players Registered
6. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. External Reg Admin widget should be visible
3. Verify widget goes into edit mode
4. Verify editable field is displayed
5. User should be able to enter a Lower Number
6. Blocker message should be displayed to user "Please correct the following errors - You have entered an invalid Registration Limit for ORG. The Registration Limit must be equal to or greater than the number of players that have already been registered."

title: Check that update the number as long as it is HIGHER than the number currently registered
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate External Reg Admin widget
3. Click Edit
4. Click Pencil icon for one the External Orgs
5. Enter a Number that is HIGHER than Players Registered
6. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. External Reg Admin widget should be visible
3. Verify widget goes into edit mode
4. Verify editable field is displayed
5. User should be able to enter a Lower Number
6. Number should be updated and saved. The limit should be updated on the relevant external organizations' applications.

title: Check Number has been updated
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Verify the Federation's Registration Limit
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. The Players Registered at the top of the site should be updated

title: Verify system does not allow this invalid Birth Date
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Fill out the form but enter the Birth Date as 02/30/2000
3. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. All fields should work appropriately. The Birth Date should state 02/30/2000
3. Verify error for Birth Date being invalid.

title: Verify I am unable to change the National ID Country
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Fill out the form but enter the Birth Country as one of the following:
- Curaco
- Mexico
- South Korea
- Venezuela
-Colombia
3. Try and change the National ID Country to a different Country
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. All fields should work appropriately. The Birth Country should set to one of the following:
- Curaco
- Mexico
- South Korea
- Venezuela
- Colombia
3. Verify that user is unable to change the Country. As the Birth Country selected requires a national ID the user should not be able to change the country.

title: Verify system does not allow this invalid Email Address
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Fill out the form but enter an email address with the @ missing
3. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. All fields should work appropriately. One of the email fields the email address should have the @ symbol missing
3. Verify error for Email being invalid.

title: Verify the player profile is deleted from the system and cannot be searched for
custom_steps:
1. Search for and open a player profile that was submitted via fed registration 
2. Delete the profile by clicking the Delete button at the bottom of the profile and click Yes to the confirmation message
3. Search for the deleted player via Quick Search
4. Search for the deleted player via Advanced Search
custom_expected:
1. Player profile is loaded
2. After clicking the delete button you should recieve a confirmation message asking if you're sure you want to delete the player. After clicking Yes to the confirmation message the home dashboard should load
3. The player should not be able to be viewed via Quick Search
4. The player should not be be able to viewed via Advanced Search

title: Verify the player is no longer in the system and is not accesible via the federation registration site
custom_steps:
1. Login as the federation that submitted the player the BOC deleted
2. In the search bar search for the player that was deleted
custom_expected:
1. The Federation Registraiton site should load
2. The deleted player should not return any results when searched for
